entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why Task.Delay method not allow the ulong data type? #84890
  • Ascii.Equals #84887
  • [API Proposal]: Support Keys property on JsonObject #84880
  • How to use mono to repeatedly load the same dll? #84879
  • [wasi] Unescaped file paths when compiling with `WasmSingleFileBundle` #84878
  • Ascii and Latin1 APIs can return wrong results for misaligned buffers #84877
    8.0.0
  • Fold GDV checks for inlined delegates #84872
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Pending cleanup in tests/run.cmd #55628
    Future
  • HttpClient on .NET 7 fails on Kerberos authentication #81595
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.Shared #65380
    8.0.0
  • Annotate Task.IsFaulted with MemberNotNullWhen(true, nameof(Exception)) #84884
  • Upgrading from .NET 7.0.103 -> .NET 7.0.203 breaks code generators #84882
  • [Jit] Indexing mod array.Length not recognized as bounds safe #9421
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E] With .NET 8.0 Preview4, debugging does not work normally on Mac X64 #84466
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] x86 assertion in stublinker #84694
    8.0.0
  • Clean Near-Unmaintainable Parallel Logic #53593
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add binary support to number formatting #84889
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable AVX-512 for string/span Equals/StartsWith #84885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84874
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] define UNW_AARCH64 aliases conditionally #84873
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix #84636 #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Upgrade ILCompiler.Build.Tasks to repo msbuild version #84883
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: enable one particular flow opt when we have PGO #84875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CodeAnalysis.src.globalconfig #84059
    area-Meta
  • Update test run scripts #84876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Eliminate bound checks for "arr[index % arr.Length]" #84231
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use AVX-512 in LowerCallMemcmp #84854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix x64 macOS and Linux managed debugging #84655
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix for x86 stublinker handling of optimized GC descs #84861
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Turn Wasm exception handling on by default and use WasmEnableExceptio… #84573
    area-Build-mono
  • Implementing GetElement, ToScalar, and WithElement for Vector512 #84791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate Parallel.For code with generic math #84853
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm] New instruction value model for jiterpreter #84866
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

Updated

  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Publish Aggregated Values For `Counter` and `UpDownCounter` For System.Diagnostics.Metrics #84846
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Generate SslConnectionInfo.Unix.cs with T4 template #84690
    area-System.Net.Security, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • Disallow `BLK<SIMD>` #84868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make `MethodTable` base size access more "typed" #84823
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][GC] Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Guid #84553
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Complex #84779
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • POC for HttpRequestException error codes #82399
    NO-MERGE
  • Fix JitDisasmWithAlignmentBoundaries #84827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • restore the upper vector at the use of GT_FIELD_LIST #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set better DfsBlockEntry stack initial capacity #84186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix nativeaot libraries test cross-build #84870
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file and native AOT dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • Making sure we have at least one region per gen during plan phase #83076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix stepping by removing the unnecessary logic in VirtualCallStubManagerManager #84869
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • CSC.RSP reference lines produce error #67590
    Backlog

Updated

  • Folded Ref Structs with Fixed Buffer causes System.AccessViolationException. #67799
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString does not use fully qualified names for default enum parameter values #56573
    C# 12.0
  • NRE in NullableWalker while editing code #67816
  • Compiler should not produce warning for nullable type parameter in XML doc cref #67737
    Backlog
  • Should Roslyn emit constrained calls rather than boxing for explicit interface calls on structs? #67789
    Compiler.Next
  • Bad top-level program syntax results in assertion in `LexicalSortKey` #67050
    C# 12.0
  • [API Proposal]: Preprocessing symbol APIs #66510
    C# 12.0
  • Variables captured in a lambda and in a local function are getting different treatment in DefiniteAssignmentPass #66557
  • High CPU usage in VBCSCompiler after update .NET 6 to .NET 7 #66895
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67330
    17.7
  • Re: Why can't we declare a top-level delegate returning a value-tuple? #67311
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix formatting of nested list patterns #67832
    Community
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Null coalescing assignment for nullable value type should set state of nullable type not underlying type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache the names of assembly symbols for PEReferences #67828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use proper type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Interceptors more #67786
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DateOnly binding in minimal API is broken when using dd-MM-yyyy or dd/MM/yyyy #47734
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47733
  • SignalR client side taking too long to connect, Using Latest Angular .Net Template on Visual Studio #47732
  • Perf regression: mvc #47729
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes_dapper #47728
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #47727
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, single_query #47726
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #47725
  • Allow/support route grouping for third-party controllers #47724

Closed

  • I configure the server to requiere client certificate but it accepts the request when client doesn't add a certificate #47638
  • Coded it’s #47730
  • UsePathBase() duplicates route paths #47723
  • WithOpenApi IFormFile support is not generating valid swagger #47692
  • Add IRouteDiagnosticsMetadata #47492
  • [Signalr-Cpp-Client] Having trouble referencing and using the lib when cross-compiling for target linux-arm (RPi4) #47495

PullRequests

Created

  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update ReadMe.SharedCode.md to mention runtime-sync.yml #47722
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, blog-candidate, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • Update the Worker template to use `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` #47720
    area-mvc
  • Add AOT flag to worker template #47721
    area-mvc
  • Add support for binding to MarkupString values #47719
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add support for logging/throwing exceptions in RDG #47657
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-runtime
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-15
entry.content:
Issues
